label: How would you describe your primary relationship with NEAR?
options: I stake NEAR to validators (not my own)
I hold NEAR in liquid staking (Metapool, Linear, etc.)
I hold NEAR but don't stake it
I work for a project building on NEAR

label: When did you first acquire NEAR?
How did you first acquire NEAR? (select all that apply)
options: Received from a project grant or bounty

label: Before this survey, had you heard of House of Stake (HoS)?
options: Yes, I know what it is and how it works
Yes, but I'm not sure what it does
No, I haven't heard of it

label: Are you aware that you can lock NEAR to receive veNEAR and participate in governance?
options: Yes, but I haven't done it

label: Can you name any active delegates in House of Stake?
Where is most of your NEAR currently?
Have you ever unlocked NEAR from veNEAR?
If you stake NEAR, what's most important to you? (rank top 3)
Have you used liquid staking protocols (Metapool, Linear, etc.) for any of your NEAR?
options: Yes, I use them for some of my NEAR
No, I prefer staking directly with validators
No, I don't trust liquid staking protocols
No, I'm not familiar with them

values: I stake NEAR to validators (not my own)

label: Have you ever started the process of locking NEAR for veNEAR but stopped before completing?
What caused you to stop? (select all that apply)
options: The process was confusing or too technical
I changed my mind about the lock-up period
I had a wallet or technical issue
I decided to stake elsewhere instead
I wasn't sure it was worth it

label: In the past year, have you ever needed quick access to staked or locked crypto funds (on any chain)?
options: Yes, and it was a problem because of lock-up periods
Yes, but I was able to access them in time
No, I haven't needed quick access

label: How much time do you currently spend on crypto governance activities (any chain) per month?
Did you participate in NEAR governance before House of Stake (e.g., NDC)?
options: I'm not aware of previous governance systems

label: How would you describe that experience?
What was the main issue?
How does your confidence in House of Stake compare to your confidence in previous NEAR governance systems?
options: More confident in House of Stake
Less confident in House of Stake
I didn't participate in previous systems

label: Have you reviewed any security audits or documentation for the veNEAR contracts?
options: Yes, and I'm satisfied with what I saw
Yes, but I still have concerns
No, but I'd want to before locking significant funds
No, I haven't thought about it

label: Which of the following have you experienced or considered? (select all that apply)
options: I've had to report crypto staking/locking activity on my taxes
I've consulted a tax professional about crypto governance participation
My organization has policies about on-chain governance participation
I've needed to access staked funds on short notice for personal or business reasons

label: Does your organization have a formal policy on participating in on-chain governance?
options: Yes, and it prohibits or restricts participation

values: My organization has policies about on-chain governance participation

label: Have you ever voted on a governance proposal (on any blockchain)?
What types of decisions have you voted on or would vote on? (select all that apply)
options: I don't vote on governance proposals

label: Have you claimed veNEAR rewards?
options: Yes, I've claimed once or twice
No, but I know I have unclaimed rewards
No, I didn't know I had rewards to claim
Not applicable — I don't have veNEAR

label: If you were to lock veNEAR, how would you prefer to participate?
options: Delegate to someone who shares my values and will vote on my behalf
Self-delegate and vote myself on proposals I care about
Self-delegate and vote on everything myself

label: What would make you trust a delegate with your voting power? (select all that apply)
options: Personal connection or reputation in the community

label: Do you know any delegates personally or by reputation?
options: Yes, I know delegates I would trust
Yes, but I don't know if I'd trust them with my vote
No, I don't know any delegates

label: How do you currently stay informed about governance proposals (on any chain)? (select all that apply)
options: I get notifications from the protocol
I check periodically when I remember
A delegate or friend keeps me informed
I use a tool or service to track proposals
I don't stay informed — it's too much to follow
Not applicable — I don't participate in governance

label: How do you stay informed about NEAR ecosystem news? (select all that apply)
options: AI summaries or news aggregators (e.g., ChatGPT, Perplexity)
My AI agent keeps me informed (e.g., Clawdbot)
Friends or colleagues share relevant updates
I don't actively follow — too much to keep up with

label: What level of AI assistance would you be comfortable with for governance?
options: None — I want to do everything myself
Summaries — help me understand proposals faster
Recommendations — suggest how I should vote or who to delegate to
Automation — vote or delegate on my behalf following rules I set

label: What's your preferred wallet for interacting with NEAR?

options: Nothing - I don't plan to participate
